name: Office Depot/OfficeMax Teacher Discount
description: 25% cash back on qualifying purchases for teachers
fullDescription: Office Depot/OfficeMax offers teachers 25% cash back on qualifying in-store purchases with teacher ID through their rewards program.
whatTheyOffer:
- 25% cash back on qualifying in-store purchases
- Free rewards membership required
- Back-to-school teacher appreciation events
- Up to 5% back through Office Depot Rewards
- Special educator pricing on select items
howToGetIt:
1. Join free Office Depot Rewards program
2. Register as educator in rewards profile
3. Show teacher ID at checkout
4. Cash back applied to rewards account
5. K-12 teachers and administrators eligible
keywords: Office Depot, OfficeMax, teacher discount, educator, 25% cash back, school supplies, classroom
